I can't/don't touch type. (Never tried learning) And I'm not saying
that to=
uch typing is bad, but I think that it's optimising the wrong
thing.

Progr=
amming is absolutely not about the typing. It's about explaining
to the com=
puter what you want it to do. I find that it takes more time
to figure out =
how I'm going to explain what I want using the
language/toolset that I have=
 than it does to hunt and peck the
characters through a keyboard.

Your mil=
age may vary, but mine has consistently divided out as
thinking takes longe=
r than typing.

amming is NOT about the typing.

veloper should learn is touch
